name: testClientUpdateNotes
description: Update notes of client from UI

testStage.description: Update notes of client from UI

steps.name: UI: verify client notes can be change
API: check that the simple client has been created
UI: search a new client by phone number

attachments.name: click on element and wait 30000ms for response OK
click on element and wait 30000ms for response OK
click on element and wait 30000ms for response OK
click on element and wait 30000ms for response OK
click on element and wait 30000ms for response OK

parameters.name: data
parameters.value: ClientCreateRequest(is_filling_up_sent=false, status=NhabfnmoB7, permitAds=true, birthdate=03-18, birthyear=1971, address=872 Jenkins Prairie, Hersheltown, CT 72036, debts=[{"date":"2023-05-02 14:51:51","desc":"uViOtoPia6","sum":2112043061}], phone=["0500-59-63-75"], email=chet.kunze@yahoo.com, notes=[{"added":"2023-05-02 14:51:51","text":"5HgILfAuzZ"}], name=Ronnie Macejkovic, gender=null)

steps.name: API: search client by new phone number
API: assert that the client notes has been updated by comparing name and address

assertThat 'ClientCreateRequest(is_filling_up_sent=false, status=NhabfnmoB7, permitAds=true, birthdate=03-18, birthyear=1971, address=872 Jenkins Prairie, Hersheltown, CT 72036, debts=[{"date":"2023-05-02 14:51:51","desc":"uViOtoPia6","sum":2112043061}], phone=["0500-59-63-75"], email=chet.kunze@yahoo.com, notes=[{"added":"2023-05-02 14:51:51","text":"5HgILfAuzZ"}], name=Ronnie Macejkovic, gender=null)'

usingRecursiveComparison '- no overridden equals methods were used in the comparison (except for java types)
- these types were compared with the following comparators:
  - java.lang.Double -> DoubleComparator[precision=1.0E-15]
  - java.lang.Float -> FloatComparator[precision=1.0E-6]
  - java.nio.file.Path -> lexicographic comparator (Path natural order)
- actual and expected objects and their fields were compared field by field recursively even if they were not of the same type, this allows for example to compare a Person to a PersonDto (call strictTypeChecking(true) to change that behavior).
'

assertThat 'ClientCreateRequest(is_filling_up_sent=false, status=NhabfnmoB7, permitAds=true, birthdate=03-18, birthyear=1971, address=872 Jenkins Prairie, Hersheltown, CT 72036, debts=[{"date":"2023-05-02 14:51:51","desc":"uViOtoPia6","sum":2112043061}], phone=["0500-59-63-75"], email=chet.kunze@yahoo.com, notes=[{"added":"2023-05-02 14:51:51","text":"5HgILfAuzZ"}], name=Ronnie Macejkovic, gender=null)'

isEqualTo 'ClientGetResponse(id=3300, name=Ronnie Macejkovic, phone=0500596375, profileImage=Hat 4.svg, address=872 Jenkins Prairie, Hersheltown, CT 72036, status=NhabfnmoB7, permitAds=false, isUnsubscribed=false, lastAppointment=null, phoneCanonical=+972500596375)'
